Case# CFLocaleLanguageDirection.topToBottom

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
case topToBottom
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFLocaleLanguageDirection/topToBottom#Discussion)

The language direction is from top to bottom.
